title: Comtesse du Barry packaging
content:
Hi,  
do you have any idea about the font(s) used for : SECRET N°05  
thx in advance.

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-5-alliance-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-bulles-rosees-et-truffes-noires.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-5-alliance-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-bulles-rosees-et-truffes-noires.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-numero-9-harmonie-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-coeur-de-figues.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-numero-9-harmonie-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-coeur-de-figues.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-7-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-a-la-truffe-noire.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-7-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-a-la-truffe-noire.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-3-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-au-sauternes.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-3-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-au-sauternes.jpg")

Font: 

 Century ITC, Numbers Strasse 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
Bodoni, roman for SECRET, bold for 05 (with a custom divot taken out of the top crossbar of the 5):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/atf-bodoni/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/atf-bodoni/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/atf-bodoni/")

No. could be Bodoni Chancery, but too small on the sample I found to be sure (could also be a catchword from another font):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-chancery/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-chancery/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-chancery/")

1/ a link to sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.comtessedubarry.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/510x430/040ec09b1e35df139433887a97daa66f/f/j/fjco20_2_7/Secret-n%C2%B005-Alliance-de-foie-gras-de-canard,-bulles-rosees-et-truffes-32.jpg)  
2/ I think it's rather [Century ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/century) than Bodoni. They also use it on their [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.comtessedubarry.com/)  
3/ N°: can't say at this size and even with a [not angled sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-7-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-a-la-truffe-noire.jpg)...

Bigger samples help.

Ryuk, I rescind the Bodoni comment. Definitely ITC Century for SECRET, and likely for 5 and 9, although the 7 and 3 don't match up.

THX guys.  
 @Ryuk you're right : it's Century ITC

For the N°5 --\> you'll find some more samples below :

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-5-alliance-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-bulles-rosees-et-truffes-noires.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-5-alliance-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-bulles-rosees-et-truffes-noires.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-numero-9-harmonie-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-coeur-de-figues.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-numero-9-harmonie-de-foie-gras-de-canard-du-sud-ouest-coeur-de-figues.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-7-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-a-la-truffe-noire.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-7-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-a-la-truffe-noire.jpg")

[http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-ba...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-3-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-au-sauternes.jpg "http://www.luxe-daily.fr/images/2012/11/foie-gras-de-noel-comtesse-du-barry-secret-n-3-foie-gras-de-canard-entier-du-sud-ouest-au-sauternes.jpg")

Well, the numbers are definitely a typeface (see attached link and image). Damned if I can find it.

[http://www.markegoebel.com/doc/news10.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.markegoebel.com/doc/news10.pdf "http://www.markegoebel.com/doc/news10.pdf")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016im_/http:/typophile.com/files/helsinki-51bb2288173b6_5704.jpg)

No. may be from Price Didone (numbers, sadly, are not):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/price-didone/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/price-didone/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/price-didone/")

The numbers (and most likely the No.) are Strasse, by Hoefler & Frere-Jones (before they split):

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/numbers/inside/strasse/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142016/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/numbers/inside/strasse/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/numbers/inside/strasse/")
